website_summaries.verdict: This dome surveillance camera comes with a protective housing to help prevent damage from vandals.
cons: If the dome glass gets dirty, it will affect the quality of your pictures

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 other Amcrest cameras. POE did not work on the 3rd (even with the proper high voltage injector) but I put up with that and ran an electric line to it. The present camera would not turn on using either POE or a direct 12 volt power supply. The other cameras (different models) have worked fine for me (once I dealt with the POE problem on Camera 3), but after two problem cameras in a row, I have returned this unit to Amazon and will now turn to other companies.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Loman

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and doesn't run reliably more than 1.3mp
customer_reviews.text: These cameras cannot run reliably at anything above 1.3mp. Even at 1080p/2mp they run out of resources. Purpose of the camera was varifocal, doesn't work very well compared to other brand at half the cost. Amcrest wifi cameras for sub 100 makes sense, but this one fails on every level and it's unreasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lance10

customer_reviews.title: Comparing 3Meg VS 8Meg
customer_reviews.text: I have my 3meg pointing outside and 8meg for inside im comparing on my 6 inch phone really much look the same. It might be look better if I hook up to 4K tv!
customer_reviews.author: bosco lai

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking camera but firmware/support is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Would not work with my third party HDView NVR, even with ONVIF. All of my other off brand cameras work with it so I'm not sure what the difference is. I went to upgrade the firmware and upgraded to a non-zoomed firmware. When I contacted support to get the newest or original firmware to roll back to, NO firmware is available whatsoever. Priced a bit too high for what it is. At this point, it is just an extra camera around the house and is the only one that is not actively recording.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a high res camera that works with Blue IRIS or standalone. Good quality, well built and easy to install. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Angela Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very good PoE Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th camera from the brand. I trust them for the quality and ease of use. Ease of connectivity: Just open the Amcrest Pro app on the phone, add device and scan the QR code to set the new password. Once set, i logged into NVR and added by searching the camera into the system. Quality of video: Excellent day and night video quality. I can set the recording settings in the NVR. Overall: One of the best video cameras i have got and ever improving hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash Shimoga Ganesh

customer_reviews.title: Incredible clarity
customer_reviews.text: Simple setup for motion detection when paired with Amcrest nvr, didn’t need any tech support personally bc of well written documentation included, not sure about night vision because of outdoor lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear and detailed imaging.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, great images and video, internal adjustments are a little tedious but not a problem with the right tools. Of the 12 Amcrest cameras I have in use, this is the clearest view. If the zoom was 10x or so, it would be my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: BPA

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: These cameras work very well for the money. Only problem is I use Firefox for browser and software not compatible. Wish Amcrest and Firefox would solve their issues.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Lachney

customer_reviews.title: It works and has a good image
customer_reviews.text: It works and has a good image, The zoom is not as significant as I expected but it is very useful. You can zoom in and aim the camera manually then button it up zoom out for the full picture. Zoom as needed, the resolution and low light is good, back scatter from IR is tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Best security cameras around
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many different security cameras and Amcrest is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Trabue

product_meta.title: Amcrest UltraHD 4K Varifocal PoE Dome Outdoor Security Camera, 4K (8-Megapixel) 3840x2160P, 164ft Night Vision, 4X Optical Zoom, Motorized Varifocal Lens 58°-110°, White (IP8M-2454EW)
feature_bullets: EXPERIENCE ULTRA HD - Observe high-quality footage with the latest 8-Megapixel progressive scanning CMOS image sensor, Ambarella S3L33M chipset, UltraHD 4K (8MP) resolution (3840x2160) at 15fps. A wide 110° viewing angle allows you to see more detail and cover more ground to keep more of what you love safe. Power Over Ethernet (POE) for easy installation (POE injector or switch required; not included, sold separately). Manual pan/tilt via hand only.

SMARTER, SAFER SECURITY - Utilize intelligent alerts that send notifications to your computer or smartphone via the Amcrest View app. Record events as soon as they happen and store them on a Amcrest NVR, MicroSD Card, Synology, QNAP, NAS, FTP, Blue Iris or Amcrest Cloud. This camera is compatible with the following Microphones, ASIN's: B07MVQTFL3, B07KTBZGC3.

ALWAYS RESILIENT - Whether it’s rain or shine, day or night, this varifocal dome camera features heavy-duty, weatherproof IP67 housing and IK10 vandal-resistant dome. With IR night-vision up to 164 feet, you can keep the people and places you love safe 24/7. Always stay in the know by recording at specific times based on your preference. H. 265 Compression technology allows for files to be compressed without any noticeable difference in quality.

FIND SOLACE IN THE CLOUD - Amcrest Cloud was created to ensure that you don’t miss a thing, no matter where you are. With an intuitive interface, you are able to live-stream your footage which enables you to play it back based on your preferences.

SIMPLE. RELIABLE. SECURE. - At Amcrest, we want to ensure the safety of our customers, their loved ones, homes and businesses. You’ll receive a full 1-year US and Lifetime Support provided directly from Amcrest.
